sourcesContent:
<template>
            <v-container fluid>
              <v-row>
                <v-col cols="12" sm="6" md="4">
                  <datetime
                    type="datetime"
                    v-model="start_time"
                    placeholder="Start Time"
                    :minute-step="15"
                    auto
                  ></datetime>
                </v-col>
              </v-row>

              <v-row>
                <v-col cols="12" sm="6" md="4">
                  <datetime
                    type="datetime"
                    v-model="end_time"
                    placeholder="End Time"
                    :minute-step="15"
                    auto
                  ></datetime>
                </v-col>
              </v-row>
            </v-container>
</template>

<script>
import { formatDateToJa } from '../../functions/datetime';

import { Datetime } from 'vue-datetime';
import 'vue-datetime/dist/vue-datetime.css';

export default {
  name: 'DateForm',
  props: ['value', 'isError'],
  methods: {
    formatDateToJa,
  },
  components: {
    'vue-timepicker': VueTimepicker,
    datetime: Datetime
  },
  data: () => ({
  datetime: '',
  }),
};
</script>
